welcome.title: Software Developer | Systems Engineering and Electronics

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description: I am a developer passionate about open source, with experience in Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, Vue, C++, Rust, Go, HTML, and CSS. Additionally, I study Systems Engineering and I am an Electronics Technician. I handle circuit design and creation (Proteus, KiCad, Arduino, PIC) and have knowledge in electrical installations.
